xtractor.schemaConverter.xer
Class XERFactory

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--xtractor.schemaConverter.xer.XERFactory
public class XERFactory
extends java.lang.Object

Author:
ss401 Factory for creating all XER Components. Note that it is the factory's responsibility to register additions of any XERCompoundConstruct with the model

Constructor Summary
XERFactory(XERBuilder builder)
          The builder is required so that the factory has access to the model

Parameters:
generalizationName - - The name of the generalization
entities - - All the entities to which the generalization apply to
minOccurs - - The minimum number of times the choice collection (AS A WHOLE) can be selected
maxOccurs - - The maximum number of times the choice collection (AS A WHOLE) can be selected
Returns:
- An XER Generalization

createXERImplicitRelationship

public XERRelationship createXERImplicitRelationship(XERCompoundConstruct parent,
                                                     XERCompoundConstruct child,
                                                     int minOccurs,
                                                     int maxOccurs)
Creates a CONTAINMENT relationship between two XERCompoundConstructs (This does NOT have to be between entities; it could be between generalizations)

Parameters:
parent - - An XERCompoundConstruct
child - - An XERCompoundConstruct
minOccurs - - the minimum number of times the child occur 'in' the parent
maxOccurs - - the maximum number of times the child occur 'in' the parent
Returns:
- An XERRelationship between the child and the parent Note that the 'backward' cardinality will always be 1:1 (I think) due to the tree structure of an XML data

createXERExplicitRelationship

Parameters:

parentsForeignKeys - - The XERForeignKey attributes of the parent which refer to the child
child - - XER Entity being referenced
minOccurs -
maxOccurs -

public XERForeignKey createXERForeignKey(XERAttribute attribute,
                                         XERCompoundConstruct child)
Note that the attribute may not be the full part of a foreign key

Parameters:
attribute - - The XERAttribute which we have discovered is PART OF a foreign key
child - - The XER Compound Construct which is BEING referenced
